publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-97 Mr Andy Kerr: Education (School Meals) (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolutionâ€”That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Education (School Meals) (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any increase attributable to that Act in expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund by or under any other Act.
S2M-97 Education (School Meals) (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolution (lodged on 30 May 2003) Tavish Scott*
